00027 public class SQLiteDatabaseSnapshot extends SqlDatabaseSnapshot {

00032     public SQLiteDatabaseSnapshot() {
00033     }

00038     public SQLiteDatabaseSnapshot(Database database) throws JDBCException {
00039         this(database, null, null);
00040     }

00046                 throws JDBCException {
00047         this(database, null, schema);

00053     public SQLiteDatabaseSnapshot(Database database, 
00054                 Set<DiffStatusListener> statusListeners) throws JDBCException {
00055         this(database, statusListeners, database.getDefaultSchemaName());
00056     }
00057 
00061     public SQLiteDatabaseSnapshot(Database database, 
00062                 Set<DiffStatusListener> statusListeners, String requestedSchema) 
00063                 throws JDBCException {
00064         super(database, statusListeners, requestedSchema);
00065     }
00066         
00070         @Override
00071         protected void readTablesAndViews(String schema) throws SQLException, 
00072                         JDBCException {
00073         
00074                 updateListeners("Reading tables for " + database.toString() + " ...");
00075         ResultSet rs = databaseMetaData.getTables(
00076                         database.convertRequestedSchemaToCatalog(schema), 
00077                         database.convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schema), 
00078                         null, 
00079                         new String[]{"TABLE", "VIEW"});
00080         
00081         while (rs.next()) {
00082             String type = rs.getString("TABLE_TYPE");
00083             String name = rs.getString("TABLE_NAME");
00084             String schemaName = rs.getString("TABLE_SCHEM");
00085             String catalogName = rs.getString("TABLE_CAT");
00086             String remarks = rs.getString("REMARKS");
00087 
00088             if (database.isSystemTable(catalogName, schemaName, name) || 
00089                         database.isLiquibaseTable(name) || 
00090                         database.isSystemView(catalogName, schemaName, name)) {
00091                 continue;
00092             }
00093 
00094             if ("TABLE".equals(type)) {
00095                 Table table = new Table(name);
00096                 table.setRemarks(StringUtils.trimToNull(remarks));
00097                 table.setDatabase(database);
00098                 tablesMap.put(name, table);
00099             } else if ("VIEW".equals(type)) {
00100                 View view = new View();
00101                 view.setName(name);
00102                 try {
00103                     view.setDefinition(database.
00104                                 getViewDefinition(schema, name));
00105                 } catch (JDBCException e) {
00106                     System.out.println("Error getting view with " + 
00107                         ((AbstractDatabase)database).
00108                                 getViewDefinitionSql(schema, name));
00109                     throw e;
00110                 }
00111                 viewsMap.put(name, view);
00112             }
00113         }
00114         rs.close();
00115         }
00116         
00120         @Override
00121         protected void readForeignKeyInformation(String schema) throws JDBCException, SQLException {
00122         updateListeners("Reading foreign keys for " + database.toString() + " ...");
00123         // Foreign keys are not supported in SQLite until now. 
00124         // ...do nothing here
00125     }
00126         
00130         @Override
00131         protected void readPrimaryKeys(String schema) throws JDBCException, SQLException {
00132         updateListeners("Reading primary keys for " + database.toString() + " ...");
00133 
00134         //we can't add directly to the this.primaryKeys hashSet because adding columns to an exising PK changes the hashCode and .contains() fails
00135         List<PrimaryKey> foundPKs = new ArrayList<PrimaryKey>();
00136 
00137         for (Table table : tablesMap.values()) {
00138             ResultSet rs = databaseMetaData.getPrimaryKeys(database.convertRequestedSchemaToCatalog(schema), database.convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schema), table.getName());
00139 
00140             while (rs.next()) {
00141                 String tableName = rs.getString("TABLE_NAME");
00142                 String columnName = rs.getString("COLUMN_NAME");
00143                 short position = rs.getShort("KEY_SEQ");
00144                 
00145                 if (!(database instanceof SQLiteDatabase)) {
00146                         position -= 1;
00147                 }
00148 
00149                 boolean foundExistingPK = false;
00150                 for (PrimaryKey pk : foundPKs) {
00151                     if (pk.getTable().getName().equals(tableName)) {
00152                         pk.addColumnName(position, columnName);
00153 
00154                         foundExistingPK = true;
00155                     }
00156                 }
00157 
00158                 if (!foundExistingPK) {
00159                     PrimaryKey primaryKey = new PrimaryKey();
00160                     primaryKey.setTable(table);
00161                     primaryKey.addColumnName(position, columnName);
00162                     primaryKey.setName(rs.getString("PK_NAME"));
00163 
00164                     foundPKs.add(primaryKey);
00165                 }
00166             }
00167 
00168             rs.close();
00169         }
00170 
00171         this.primaryKeys.addAll(foundPKs);
00172     }
00173         
00174         protected void readColumns(String schema) throws SQLException, JDBCException {
00175         updateListeners("Reading columns for " + database.toString() + " ...");
00176 
00177         if (database instanceof SQLiteDatabase) {
00178                 // ...work around for SQLite
00179                 for (Table cur_table:tablesMap.values()) {
00180                 Statement selectStatement = database.getConnection().createStatement();
00181                 ResultSet rs = databaseMetaData.getColumns(database.convertRequestedSchemaToCatalog(schema), database.convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schema), cur_table.getName(), null);
00182                 if (rs==null) {
00183                         rs = databaseMetaData.getColumns(database.convertRequestedSchemaToCatalog(schema), database.convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schema), cur_table.getName(), null);
00184                 }
00185                 while ((rs!=null) && rs.next()) {
00186                         Column columnInfo = readColumnInfo(schema,rs);
00187                         if (columnInfo!=null) {
00188                                 columnsMap.put(columnInfo.getTable().getName() + "." + columnInfo.getName(), columnInfo);
00189                         }
00190                 }
00191                 if (rs!=null) {
00192                         rs.close();
00193                 }
00194                 selectStatement.close();
00195                 }
00196         } else {
00197                 // ...if it is no SQLite database
00198                 Statement selectStatement = database.getConnection().createStatement();
00199                 ResultSet rs = databaseMetaData.getColumns(database.convertRequestedSchemaToCatalog(schema), database.convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schema), null, null);
00200                 while (rs.next()) {
00201                     Column columnInfo = readColumnInfo(schema,rs);
00202                     if (columnInfo!=null) {
00203                         columnsMap.put(columnInfo.getTable().getName() + "." + columnInfo.getName(), columnInfo);
00204                     }
00205                 }
00206                 rs.close();
00207                 selectStatement.close();
00208         }
00209     }
00210         
00211         private Column readColumnInfo(String schema, ResultSet rs) throws SQLException, JDBCException {
00212         Column columnInfo = new Column();       
00213         
00214         String tableName = rs.getString("TABLE_NAME");
00215         String columnName = rs.getString("COLUMN_NAME");
00216         String schemaName = rs.getString("TABLE_SCHEM");
00217         String catalogName = rs.getString("TABLE_CAT");
00218                 
00219         String upperCaseTableName = tableName.toUpperCase(Locale.ENGLISH);
00220         
00221         if (database.isSystemTable(catalogName, schemaName, upperCaseTableName) || 
00222                         database.isLiquibaseTable(upperCaseTableName)) {
00223             return null;
00224         }
00225 
00226         Table table = tablesMap.get(tableName);
00227         if (table == null) {
00228             View view = viewsMap.get(tableName);
00229             if (view == null) {
00230                 log.info("Could not find table or view " + tableName + " for column " + columnName);
00231                 return null;
00232             } else {
00233                 columnInfo.setView(view);
00234                 view.getColumns().add(columnInfo);
00235             }
00236         } else {
00237             columnInfo.setTable(table);
00238             table.getColumns().add(columnInfo);
00239         }
00240 
00241         columnInfo.setName(columnName);
00242         columnInfo.setDataType(rs.getInt("DATA_TYPE"));
00243         columnInfo.setColumnSize(rs.getInt("COLUMN_SIZE"));
00244         columnInfo.setDecimalDigits(rs.getInt("DECIMAL_POINTS"));
00245         Object defaultValue = rs.getObject("COLUMN_DEF");
00246         try {
00247             columnInfo.setDefaultValue(database.convertDatabaseValueToJavaObject(defaultValue, columnInfo.getDataType(), columnInfo.getColumnSize(), columnInfo.getDecimalDigits()));
00248         } catch (ParseException e) {
00249             throw new JDBCException(e);
00250         }
00251 
00252         int nullable = rs.getInt("NULLABLE");
00253         if (nullable == DatabaseMetaData.columnNoNulls) {
00254             columnInfo.setNullable(false);
00255         } else if (nullable == DatabaseMetaData.columnNullable) {
00256             columnInfo.setNullable(true);
00257         }
00258 
00259         columnInfo.setPrimaryKey(isPrimaryKey(columnInfo));
00260         columnInfo.setAutoIncrement(database.isColumnAutoIncrement(schema, tableName, columnName));
00261         columnInfo.setTypeName(database.getColumnType(rs.getString("TYPE_NAME"), columnInfo.isAutoIncrement()));            
00262                 
00263         return columnInfo;
00264     }
00265         
00266         protected void readIndexes(String schema) throws JDBCException, SQLException {
00267         updateListeners("Reading indexes for " + database.toString() + " ...");
00268 
00269         for (Table table : tablesMap.values()) {
00270             ResultSet rs = null;
00271             Statement statement = null;
00272             Map<String, Index> indexMap = new HashMap<String, Index>();            
00273            
00274                 // for the odbc driver at http://www.ch-werner.de/sqliteodbc/ 
00275                 // databaseMetaData.getIndexInfo is not implemented
00276                 statement = database.getConnection().createStatement();
00277                 String sql = "PRAGMA index_list("+table.getName()+");";
00278                 try {
00279                         rs = statement.executeQuery(sql);
00280                 } catch(SQLException e) {
00281                         if (!e.getMessage().equals("query does not return ResultSet")) {
00282                                 System.err.println(e);
00283 //                              throw e;
00284                         }                       
00285                 }
00286                 while ((rs!=null) && rs.next()) {
00287                         String index_name = rs.getString("name");
00288                         boolean index_unique = rs.getBoolean("unique");
00289                         sql = "PRAGMA index_info("+index_name+");";
00290                                 Statement statement_2 = database.getConnection().createStatement();
00291                                 ResultSet rs_2 = statement_2.executeQuery(sql);
00292                 while ((rs_2!=null) && rs_2.next()) {
00293                         int index_column_seqno = rs_2.getInt("seqno");
00294 //                              int index_column_cid = rs.getInt("cid");
00295                         String index_column_name = rs_2.getString("name");
00296                         if (index_unique) {
00297                                 Column column = columnsMap.get(
00298                                                 table.getName()+"."+index_column_name);
00299                                 column.setUnique(true);
00300                         } else {
00301                                 Index indexInformation;
00302                         if (indexMap.containsKey(index_name)) {
00303                             indexInformation = indexMap.get(index_name);
00304                         } else {
00305                             indexInformation = new Index();
00306                             indexInformation.setTable(table);
00307                             indexInformation.setName(index_name);
00308                             indexInformation.setFilterCondition("");
00309                             indexMap.put(index_name, indexInformation);
00310                         }
00311                         indexInformation.getColumns().add(index_column_seqno,index_column_name);
00312                         }
00313                 }
00314                 if (rs_2!=null) {
00315                         rs_2.close();
00316                 }
00317                 if (statement_2 != null) {
00318                         statement_2.close();
00319                     }
00320                 
00321                 }
00322                 if (rs!=null) {
00323                         rs.close();
00324                 }
00325             if (statement != null) {
00326                 statement.close();
00327             }
00328     
00329             for (Map.Entry<String, Index> entry : indexMap.entrySet()) {
00330                 indexes.add(entry.getValue());
00331             }
00332         }
00333 
00334         //remove PK indexes
00335         Set<Index> indexesToRemove = new HashSet<Index>();
00336         for (Index index : indexes) {
00337             for (PrimaryKey pk : primaryKeys) {
00338                 if (index.getTable().getName().equalsIgnoreCase(pk.getTable().getName())
00339                         && index.getColumnNames().equals(pk.getColumnNames())) {
00340                     indexesToRemove.add(index);
00341                 }
00342             }
00343         }
00344         indexes.removeAll(indexesToRemove);
00345     }
00346         
00347         protected void readSequences(String schema) throws JDBCException {
00348         updateListeners("Reading sequences for " + database.toString() + " ...");
00349 
00350         if (database.supportsSequences()) {
00351             //noinspection unchecked
00352             List<String> sequenceNamess = (List<String>) database.getJdbcTemplate().queryForList(database.createFindSequencesSQL(schema), String.class);
00353 
00354 
00355             for (String sequenceName : sequenceNamess) {
00356                 Sequence seq = new Sequence();
00357                 seq.setName(sequenceName.trim());
00358 
00359                 sequences.add(seq);
00360             }
00361         }
00362     }
00363
